医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示过敏和哮喘患者鼻腔真菌的多样性近四分之一的葡萄牙成年人患有导致流鼻涕的过敏症。这种呼吸道疾病的正式名称为过敏性鼻炎，经常与哮喘相关，是世界各地的一个常见问题，上呼吸道是研究潜在疾病过程的关键目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-nasal-fungi-diversity-in-allergy-and-asthma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-nasal-fungi-diversity-in-allergy-and-asthma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf595e22-9c89-4680-8875-ce91e9700eeb Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:58:51 -0500 Study reveals nasal fungi diversity in allergy and asthma patients
报告强调住房对健康和福祉的影响伦敦大学学院健康公平研究所 (IHE) 今天（12 月 17 日星期二）发布了一份开创性的新报告，强调了住房对健康和福祉的深远影响（包括积极和消极的影响）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Report-highlights-the-impact-of-housing-on-health-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Report-highlights-the-impact-of-housing-on-health-and-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2196706d-6ecd-4e46-9c5c-f805d8cb201c Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:49:31 -0500 Report highlights the impact of housing on health and wellbeing
了解流感保护层的突破为新疗法开辟了道路为了对抗引起流感的病毒，科学家们正在探索的途径之一是开发能够破坏其基因组稳定的药物，该基因组由八个 RNA 分子组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Breakthrough-in-understanding-influenzas-protective-coat-opens-path-to-new-treatmen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Breakthrough-in-understanding-influenzas-protective-coat-opens-path-to-new-treatmen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5563bd75-44bc-42e4-b085-d28f5a4fcc55 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:40:00 -0500 Breakthrough in understanding influenza's protective coat opens path to new treatments
保险挑战正在损害获得心理健康服务的机会根据美国心理学会的 2024 年从业者脉搏调查，尽管对心理健康治疗的需求仍然很高，但行政和财务障碍阻碍了许多心理学家参与保险网络。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Insurance-challenges-are-hurting-access-to-mental-health-services.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Insurance-challenges-are-hurting-access-to-mental-health-services.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64087b31-4cc8-4bee-8839-ab9323e1d6ae Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:26:53 -0500 Insurance challenges are hurting access to mental health services
驾驶职业可能会降低阿尔茨海默病的死亡率一项新的研究提出了一种可能性，即需要频繁空间处理的工作——例如找出出租车路线或导航到医院的最佳方式——可能会降低阿尔茨海默病的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Driving-ocupations-could-lead-to-lower-rates-of-death-from-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Driving-occupations-could-lead-to-lower-rates-of-death-from-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=106e33cb-c7e7-451e-8896-6ebb16b29382 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 07:47:57 -0500 Driving occupations could lead to lower rates of death from Alzheimer's disease
新的血液检测提供了检测心脏移植排斥反应的非侵入性方法血液测试可以显示接受者是否能够耐受新心脏并且不会被排斥。瑞典哥德堡大学的一篇论文表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-blood-test-offers-non-pressive-way-to-detect-heart-transplant-rejection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-blood-test-offers-non-pressive-way-to-detect-heart-transplant-rejection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b913ca6a-ca2e-4803-ae2f-d5ce603519b2 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 07:02:00 -0500 New blood test offers non-invasive way to detect heart transplant rejection
研究解释了人体内部时钟如何影响免疫系统的炎症过程RCSI 医学与健康科学大学的新研究解释了人体内部时钟如何影响免疫系统的炎症过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-explains-how-the-bodye28099s-internal-clock-influences-炎症-process-of-the-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-explains-how-the-bodye28099s-internal-clock-influences-炎症-process-of-the-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27865d5b-bacd-4d8c-8f5c-f7f2f363bd17 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 06:19:00 -0500 Study explains how the body’s internal clock influences inflammatory process of the immune system
开创性研究显示唐氏综合症认知治疗的有希望的结果ICOD（改善唐氏综合症）项目是一项解决与唐氏综合症相关的认知困难的开创性研究，该项目证明了由法国生物技术公司 Aelis Farma 开发的 AEF0217 分子治疗的安全性，以及其在改善唐氏综合症认知方面的有效性。这些人的认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Pioneering-study-shows-promising-results-for-cognitive-treatment-in-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Pioneering-study-shows-promising-results-for-cognitive-treatment-in-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5046e3c-4c46-48f6-b981-8f1374ed592b Tue, 17 Dec 2024 06:09:05 -0500 Pioneering study shows promising results for cognitive treatment in Down syndrome
特朗普挑选的最高卫生职位不仅仅是竞争对手团队，而是“对手团队”候任总统唐纳德·特朗普的联邦卫生机构候选人中的许多人都推行了一些政策和目标，这些政策和目标使他们彼此之间或与特朗普选择管理卫生与公共服务部的小罗伯特·F·肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.）存在分歧，这为公共卫生举措的内部摩擦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Trumpe28099s-picks-for-top-health-jobs-not-just-team-of-rivals-but-e28098team-of-opponentse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Trumpe28099s-picks-for-top-health-jobs-not-just-team-of-rivals-but-e28098team-of-opponentse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6623912-ea6a-4388-9933-445b877912e5 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 05:50:00 -0500 Trump’s picks for top health jobs not just team of rivals but ‘team of opponents’
特朗普对移民医疗保健的威胁因经济希望而减弱当选总统唐纳德·特朗普承诺进行大规模驱逐和更严格的移民限制，这加深了加州移民对医疗保健系统的不信任，并为该州最贫困居民提供服务的医疗服务提供者的未来蒙上阴影。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Trump-threat-to-immigrant-health-care-tempered-by-economic-hopes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Trump-threat-to-immigrant-health-care-tempered-by-economic-hopes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02bf48b0-f202-4cc4-b21c-d94caeae4816 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 05:48:00 -0500 Trump threat to immigrant health care tempered by economic hopes
